content: It took a little longer than I suspected, but the world is going to go berserk with this terrorist crap. One day when you look across the street at your neighbor and he looks back at you, the only thought on your mind is the brain washed fear that has been instilled in you to be afraid...be very afraid, the means of legally protecting yourself and your family have diminished, you are forced to trust a government to care for you and protect you and the only good guys on the roads are the politicaly correct ones that have these little bans going around their forearms with the proper symbal and the ones that display proper patriotism in public and shout out what they believe in the name of their FLAG as the ONES of justice and all others must die. Sounds faintly familiar..... "http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/crime/police-identify-200-children-as-potential-terrorists-1656027.html"

title: Police identify 200 children as potential terrorists
